price: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
